summary: My personal collection of tweaks and patches for a wide range of player homes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89787/89787-1519754678-678943808.png[/img]﻿[/center]
[center][font=Verdana][size=6] PATCHES for PLAYER HOMES[/size][/font][/center]

I adore player homes and most of my playthroughs center around cherry picking the best and applying some special sauce.  I tweak them and add various QOL fixes such as Navmesh, pathfinding errors, collision markers, optimization, lighting, statics etc - though sometimes I move the whole shebang across the map.  I have other favourite home builders and I have a page for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86408]Elianora here[/url] and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84868]Clef J here[/url]. I also have a lot of other mods available for ETaC like [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84868]patches with JK[/url]﻿ and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75196]tweaks to Lighting[/url] plus [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81443]alternate textures[/url] for the villages.   

Requirements and other information are available in the attached spoilers. 

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89787/89787-1519682571-578307163.jpeg[/img][/center][spoiler]
[size=4]Nightshade Haven[/size]

This gorgeous player home in Riften is almost perfect but I wanted access to it without having to go scurrying through the tunnels under Riften. My solution was to add another door in the Ratway. This file also requires Dawn Of Skyrim.

I also repaired Navmesh and tidied up the portals and room bounds.

[color=#ffff00]LOAD ORDER:[/color]
DawnOfSkyrim-AllMajorCities.esp
HAUS.esp

[color=#ffff00]CREDITS:[/color]
Credits to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2779850]Sokkvabekk[/url] for Nightshade Haven
Credits to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6315097]BluePianoTwo[/url] for Dawn Of Skyrim

[color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS:[/color]
You need to download the original mods then use my edited HAUS.esp plugin to overwrite/replace the original.

Link to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58275/]Dawn Of Skyrim[/url]
Link to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70321/]Nightshade Haven[/url]﻿
[/spoiler]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89787/89787-1519757366-1659522519.png[/img][/center][spoiler]
[size=4]Leaf Rest on Lake Ilinalta[/size]

Leaf Rest maybe my favourite player home but with all my other Riverwood mods FPS was hurting. Rather than lose it I relocated and moved Leaf Rest down to the shores of Lake Ilinalta.

[color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS:[/color]
You need to download the original mod for its resources but use my plugin etc to overwrite.

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33661/]LINK[/url] to Leaf Rest.

[color=#ffff00]CREDITS:[/color]
Credits to [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33661/]Aukmat for Leaf Rest[/url] who gave me permission to host this mod on my own page.

[color=#ffff00]LINKS:[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76368/?tab=files]LINK[/url] to Leaf Rest Real Shelter Patch (Riverwood Location)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76368/?tab=files]LINK[/url] to Leaf Rest Real Shelter Patch (Lake Ilinalta Location)
[/spoiler]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89787/89787-1519903319-2086783944.png[/img][/center]
[spoiler]
[size=4]Whitetail Edge[/size]

This home in the Rift is tucked away in the forest near Heartwood Mill and is a stunning place for a nature lover to set up home. There were a few things that needed fixed so I set about the task of rebuilding the navmesh, adding Navcut, placing lights on timers and other bits and bobs.

[color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS:
[/color]You need to download the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57014/?]original mod[/url] then use my files to overwrite.

[color=#ffff00]CREDITS:
[/color]Credits to CounterCruel for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57014/?]original mod[/url]. 

[color=#ffff00]LINKS:
[/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76368/?tab=files]LINK[/url] to Whitetail Edge Real Shelter Patch
[/spoiler]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89787/89787-1519905759-1058439325.jpeg[/img][/center]
[spoiler]
[size=4]Dream Of Moon Cabin

[/size]With some of the best lake views in Skyrim, Dream Of Moon Cabin is a must have. The original mod had a few issues so I patched them up, added some extras and I flipping love this place.

[color=#ffff00]REQUIREMENTS:[/color]
You still need to download the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43569/?]original mod[/url] for the resources then use my files to overwrite.

[color=#ffff00]CREDITS:[/color]
Credits to Psylvermom for the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43569/?]original mod.[/url]

[color=#ffff00]LINKS:[/color]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76368/?tab=files]LINK[/url] to Dream Of Moon Cabin Real Shelter Patch
[/spoiler]

Checkout my latest mod, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82943]K747 Patches for ClefJ mods[/url].

Here's a big link to the rest of my mods.
[size=6][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13953925/?tb=mods&pUp=1]BIG LINK[/url][/size]

author: Kojak747
